title: Forensic Molecular Biology VR Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology knowledge and introductory-level molecular biology comprehension
context.additional_context: VR-based experimental and field investigation simulation training for professionals with practical experience

learning_goals: Accurately perform core forensic molecular biology laboratory procedures—from DNA extraction to analysis—in a VR environment
Apply evidence collection and molecular biological analysis techniques in virtual crime scene investigations (CSI)
Explain complex scientific concepts by linking them to real-world cases through VR simulation-based collaborative learning
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
